title: Admin Quick Start
description: Quick guide for administrators to manage the system.

steps.title: User Management
steps.description: Navigate to Users page to add, edit, or deactivate user accounts. Assign appropriate roles and sections.

steps.title: System Configuration
steps.description: Use System Configuration page to manage law sections, inspection types, and other system settings.

steps.title: Database Backup
steps.description: Regularly backup your database from the Database Backup page. You can schedule automatic backups.

steps.title: Monitor Activity
steps.description: Check the Dashboard for system-wide statistics and review audit logs for security monitoring.

title: Frequently Asked Questions
description: Common questions and answers about using the system.

steps.title: How do I reset my password?
steps.description: Click on your user dropdown in the top-right corner and select 'Change Password'. If you forgot your password, use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page.

steps.title: Why can't I see certain menu items?
steps.description: Menu visibility is role-based. Some features are only available to specific user roles (Admin, Section Chief, etc.). Contact your administrator if you need access.

steps.title: How do I print or export reports?
steps.description: Most pages have export options. Look for the export or print button typically located in the top-right area of data tables.

steps.title: Can I use the system on mobile devices?
steps.description: Yes! The system is responsive and works on tablets and smartphones. The Help Center automatically becomes full-screen on mobile for better readability.

steps.title: What are keyboard shortcuts?
steps.description: Press F1 or ? to open Help Center anytime. Press ESC to close modals. More shortcuts may be available in specific pages.

title: Dashboard Overview
description: Learn how to navigate and use the dashboard effectively.

steps.title: Access the Dashboard
steps.description: The Dashboard is your home page when you log in. It provides an overview of your tasks, statistics, and recent activity.

steps.title: View Statistics
steps.description: The dashboard displays key metrics including total establishments, pending inspections, completed inspections, and compliance rates.

steps.title: Review Pending Tasks
steps.description: Check the 'Pending Tasks' section to see inspections that require your attention or action.

steps.title: Quick Actions
steps.description: Use quick action buttons to create new inspections, add establishments, or access frequently used features.

title: Understanding Dashboard Statistics
description: Learn what each statistic on the dashboard means and how to interpret them.

steps.title: Establishment Counts
steps.description: View total number of establishments, active establishments, and establishments by status.

steps.title: Inspection Metrics
steps.description: See pending inspections, completed inspections, and inspection completion rates.

steps.title: Compliance Status
steps.description: Monitor compliance rates and track establishments that are compliant vs non-compliant.

steps.title: Recent Activity
steps.description: View recent inspections, updates, and system activities in chronological order.

title: How to Add Establishment
description: Step by step guide to add a new establishment.

steps.title: Open the Establishments Page
steps.description: Navigate to the 'Establishments' section from the sidebar.

steps.title: Click Add Establishment
steps.description: Click the 'Add Establishment' button on the top-right corner.

steps.title: Fill the Form
steps.description: Enter all the required details like Name, Address, Coordinates, Business Type, and other relevant information.

steps.title: Set Location
steps.description: Use the map picker to set the establishment's location coordinates, or enter them manually.

steps.title: Save
steps.description: Click 'Save' to add the establishment to the system. You can add a polygon boundary later if needed.

title: How to Edit Establishment
description: Guide for modifying existing establishment details.

steps.title: Navigate to Establishments
steps.description: Go to the Establishments page from the sidebar.

steps.title: Find the Establishment
steps.description: Use the search bar or browse the list to find the establishment you want to edit.

steps.title: Click Edit Button
steps.description: Click the 'Edit' button next to the establishment name or open the establishment details and click 'Edit'.

steps.title: Update Information
steps.description: Modify the necessary fields including name, address, coordinates, business type, or any other details.

steps.title: Save Changes
steps.description: Click 'Save' to update the establishment information. Changes will be logged in the audit trail.

title: How to View and Edit Polygons
description: Learn how to view and manage establishment boundary polygons.

steps.title: Access Polygon View
steps.description: Click the 'Polygon' button next to any establishment in the establishments list.

steps.title: View Existing Polygon
steps.description: If a polygon exists, it will be displayed on the map in blue. You can zoom and pan to view it clearly.

steps.title: Edit Polygon
steps.description: Click 'Create Polygon' or 'Update Polygon' to enter edit mode. This allows you to draw or modify the boundary.

steps.title: Draw or Modify
steps.description: Click on the map to add points, or drag existing points to modify the polygon shape. Right-click to remove points.

steps.title: Save Changes
steps.description: Click 'Save Polygon' to store your changes. The polygon will be associated with the establishment.

title: Searching and Filtering Establishments
description: Learn how to efficiently search and filter establishments.

steps.title: Use the Search Bar
steps.description: Type in the search bar at the top of the establishments page to search by name, address, or business type.

steps.title: Apply Filters
steps.description: Use filter options to narrow down results by status, business type, section, or other criteria.

steps.title: Sort Results
steps.description: Click on column headers to sort establishments by name, date created, or other attributes.

steps.title: Export Results
steps.description: Use the export button to download filtered results as CSV or Excel for reporting purposes.

title: How to Create Inspections
description: Step by step guide to create new inspections.

steps.title: Navigate to Inspections
steps.description: Go to the Inspections page from the sidebar.

steps.title: Start New Inspection
steps.description: Click the 'New Inspection' button in the top-right corner.

steps.title: Select Establishments
steps.description: Choose one or more establishments to inspect. You can search and select multiple establishments.

steps.title: Choose Law Section
steps.description: Select the appropriate law section for the inspection from the dropdown menu.

steps.title: Complete the Wizard
steps.description: Follow the wizard steps to provide inspection details, dates, and other required information.

steps.title: Submit
steps.description: Review your information and click 'Create Inspection' to finalize. The inspection will be assigned based on workflow rules.

title: Completing Inspection Forms
description: Guide for filling out inspection forms with all required information.

steps.title: Open Inspection Form
steps.description: Navigate to your assigned inspection and click 'Start Inspection' or 'Continue' to open the form.

steps.title: Fill Required Sections
steps.description: Complete all required sections of the inspection form. Required fields are marked with an asterisk (*).

steps.title: Upload Documentation
steps.description: Attach photos, documents, or other evidence using the file upload sections. Multiple files can be uploaded.

steps.title: Mark Compliance Status
steps.description: For each requirement, mark whether the establishment is compliant or non-compliant with detailed notes.

steps.title: Save Draft
steps.description: Click 'Save Draft' to save your progress. You can return later to complete the form.

steps.title: Submit for Review
steps.description: Once all sections are complete, click 'Submit' to send the inspection for review by your supervisor.

title: Understanding Inspection Workflow
description: Learn about the inspection workflow and status transitions.

steps.title: Created Status
steps.description: When an inspection is first created, it starts in 'Created' status and awaits assignment.

steps.title: Section Assignment
steps.description: Inspections are assigned to appropriate sections (Section Chief, Unit Head, or Monitoring Personnel) based on workflow rules.

steps.title: In Progress
steps.description: Once assigned, inspectors mark inspections as 'In Progress' while completing the inspection form.

steps.title: Review Process
steps.description: Completed inspections go through review stages: Unit Review, Section Review, and Division Review for compliant cases.

steps.title: Legal Review
steps.description: Non-compliant inspections are routed to Legal Unit for review and may result in NOV (Notice of Violation) or NOO (Notice of Order).

steps.title: Closure
steps.description: Inspections are closed as either 'Compliant' or 'Non-Compliant' after all review processes are complete.

title: Reviewing Inspections
description: Guide for supervisors to review and approve inspections.

steps.title: Access Review Page
steps.description: Navigate to the Inspections page and find inspections pending your review. They will be marked with a review indicator.

steps.title: Open Inspection
steps.description: Click on the inspection to view all details, compliance status, and uploaded documentation.

steps.title: Review Information
steps.description: Carefully review all sections of the inspection form, compliance findings, and attached documents.

steps.title: Add Comments
steps.description: Add review comments or notes if you need to request changes or provide feedback.

steps.title: Approve or Request Changes
steps.description: Approve the inspection to move it to the next stage, or request changes to be made by the inspector.

title: Generating Inspection Reports
description: Learn how to generate and export inspection reports.

steps.title: Access Report View
steps.description: Open a completed inspection and click 'View Report' to see the formatted inspection report.

steps.title: Review Report
steps.description: The report displays all inspection details, findings, compliance status, and recommendations in a formatted view.

steps.title: Export as PDF
steps.description: Click 'Export PDF' to download the inspection report as a PDF document for printing or sharing.

steps.title: Print Report
steps.description: Use the print button to print the report directly from your browser.

title: How to Use the Interactive Map
description: Navigate and utilize the interactive map to view establishments and their locations.

steps.title: Access the Map
steps.description: Click 'Map' from the sidebar to open the interactive map view.

steps.title: View Establishments
steps.description: All establishments are displayed as markers on the map. Click on any marker to view establishment details.

steps.title: Zoom and Pan
steps.description: Use mouse wheel to zoom, or click and drag to pan around the map. Use zoom controls in the corner for precise navigation.

steps.title: View Polygons
steps.description: Establishments with defined boundaries will show polygon overlays. Click on polygons to see establishment information.

steps.title: Search Locations
steps.description: Use the search bar to find specific addresses or locations on the map.

title: Managing Geographic Boundaries
description: Learn how to create and manage establishment boundary polygons on the map.

steps.title: Select Establishment
steps.description: From the Map page, click on an establishment marker or search for the establishment you want to manage.

steps.title: Open Polygon Editor
steps.description: Click 'Manage Polygon' or 'Edit Boundary' to open the polygon editing interface.

steps.title: Draw New Polygon
steps.description: Click 'Create Polygon' and then click on the map to place points. Connect points to form a closed polygon.

steps.title: Edit Existing Polygon
steps.description: Click and drag existing polygon points to modify the shape, or add new points by clicking on polygon edges.

steps.title: Save Boundary
steps.description: Click 'Save' to store the polygon. The boundary will be associated with the establishment and visible on the map.

title: Geographic Search and Filtering
description: Use map features to search and filter establishments by location.

steps.title: Use Map Filters
steps.description: Apply filters on the map page to show only establishments matching specific criteria (status, type, section).

steps.title: Zoom to Area
steps.description: Zoom into a specific geographic area to see establishments in that region more clearly.

steps.title: Cluster View
steps.description: When zoomed out, establishments are grouped into clusters. Zoom in to see individual markers.

steps.title: Export Map Data
steps.description: Export visible establishments on the map as a list or download geographic data for analysis.

title: How to Manage Users
description: Guide for adding, editing, and managing user accounts.

steps.title: Access Users Page
steps.description: Navigate to 'Users' from the sidebar (admin only).

steps.title: Add New User
steps.description: Click 'Add User' button and fill in the required information including name, email, and password.

steps.title: Assign Role and Section
steps.description: Select appropriate user role (Admin, Division Chief, Section Chief, Unit Head, Monitoring Personnel, Legal Unit) and assign to a section.

steps.title: Set Permissions
steps.description: Configure specific permissions and access levels for the user based on their role and responsibilities.

steps.title: Set User Status
steps.description: Activate or deactivate users as needed using the action menu. Deactivated users cannot log in.

title: How to Edit Profile
description: Guide for editing user profile and avatar.

steps.title: Go to Profile Settings
steps.description: Click on your avatar in the top-right corner and choose 'Profile Settings'.

steps.title: Edit Details
steps.description: Update your name, email, phone number, and other personal information as needed.

steps.title: Upload Avatar
steps.description: Click on the avatar image to upload a new profile picture. Supported formats: JPG, PNG, WebP.

steps.title: Save Changes
steps.description: Click 'Save' to update your profile. Changes will be reflected immediately.

title: Understanding User Roles
description: Learn about different user roles and their permissions.

steps.title: Admin
steps.description: Full system access including user management, system configuration, and all features. Can manage all establishments and inspections.

steps.title: Division Chief
steps.description: Full access to manage establishments, users within their division, and inspections. Can review and approve inspections.

steps.title: Section Chief
steps.description: Can manage establishments and create inspections within their section. Can review and assign inspections to unit heads.

steps.title: Unit Head
steps.description: Can add/edit establishments and create inspections. Can review inspections assigned to their unit. No user management access.

steps.title: Monitoring Personnel
steps.description: Can create inspections and edit polygons. Can complete inspection forms. Cannot edit establishments or manage users.

steps.title: Legal Unit
steps.description: Has access to legal documents, billing, NOV/NOO management, and reports. Cannot modify establishments or inspections.

title: Managing Notifications
description: Learn how to view and manage system notifications.

steps.title: View Notifications
steps.description: Click the bell icon in the top-right corner to view your notifications. A badge shows the count of unread notifications.

steps.title: Read Notifications
steps.description: Click on any notification to mark it as read and view details. Unread notifications are highlighted.

steps.title: Mark as Read
steps.description: Click 'Mark All as Read' to mark all notifications as read at once.

steps.title: Notification Types
steps.description: Notifications include inspection assignments, review requests, status updates, and system alerts.

steps.title: Notification Settings
steps.description: Configure notification preferences to control what types of notifications you receive.

title: Notification Settings
description: Configure how and when you receive notifications.

steps.title: Access Settings
steps.description: Go to your profile settings and navigate to the 'Notifications' tab.

steps.title: Choose Notification Types
steps.description: Select which types of notifications you want to receive: inspection assignments, reviews, status updates, etc.

steps.title: Set Frequency
steps.description: Choose how often you want to receive notifications: immediately, daily digest, or weekly summary.

steps.title: Email Notifications
steps.description: Enable or disable email notifications for important alerts and updates.

title: Generating Accomplishment Reports
description: Learn how to create and export accomplishment reports.

steps.title: Access Reports Page
steps.description: Navigate to 'Reports' from the sidebar to access the reports section.

steps.title: Select Report Type
steps.description: Choose 'Accomplishment Report' from the available report types.

steps.title: Set Date Range
steps.description: Select the date range for the report using the date picker. You can choose specific months or date ranges.

steps.title: Configure Filters
steps.description: Apply filters for section, unit, inspector, or inspection type to narrow down the report data.

steps.title: Generate Report
steps.description: Click 'Generate Report' to create the accomplishment report with statistics and summaries.

steps.title: Export Report
steps.description: Export the report as PDF or Excel for printing or sharing with supervisors.

title: Exporting Data
description: Learn how to export data from various pages in the system.

steps.title: Find Export Button
steps.description: Look for the export button (usually in the top-right area) on pages with data tables like Establishments, Inspections, or Users.

steps.title: Choose Export Format
steps.description: Select your preferred export format: CSV (for Excel) or Excel (.xlsx) format.

steps.title: Apply Filters First
steps.description: If you want to export filtered data, apply your filters and search criteria before clicking export.

steps.title: Download File
steps.description: Click 'Export' and the file will download to your computer. Open it with Excel or any spreadsheet application.

title: Billing Management
description: Guide for managing billing and payment records.

steps.title: Access Billing Page
steps.description: Navigate to 'Billing' from the sidebar (Legal Unit access only).

steps.title: View Billing Records
steps.description: View all billing records, payment status, and outstanding balances for establishments.

steps.title: Create Billing Entry
steps.description: Click 'Add Billing' to create a new billing record for an establishment.

steps.title: Record Payment
steps.description: Update billing records when payments are received. Mark payments as complete and update balances.

steps.title: Generate Billing Reports
steps.description: Export billing reports and payment summaries for accounting and record-keeping purposes.

title: Managing NOV and NOO
description: Learn how to create and manage Notice of Violation (NOV) and Notice of Order (NOO) documents.

steps.title: Access Legal Review
steps.description: Navigate to inspections that require legal review. These are typically non-compliant inspections.

steps.title: Review Inspection
steps.description: Review the inspection findings, compliance status, and documentation to determine if NOV or NOO is required.

steps.title: Create NOV
steps.description: For violations, create a Notice of Violation document. Fill in violation details, requirements, and deadlines.

steps.title: Create NOO
steps.description: For orders, create a Notice of Order document. Specify the order requirements and compliance deadlines.

steps.title: Send Documents
steps.description: Send NOV or NOO documents to the establishment. Track delivery and response status.

steps.title: Track Compliance
steps.description: Monitor establishment responses and compliance with NOV/NOO requirements. Update status as needed.

title: System Configuration
description: Guide for configuring system settings and parameters.

steps.title: Access System Config
steps.description: Navigate to 'System Configuration' from the sidebar (admin only).

steps.title: Manage Law Sections
steps.description: Add, edit, or remove law sections that are used in inspections. Configure section details and requirements.

steps.title: Configure Inspection Types
steps.description: Set up different inspection types and their associated requirements and workflows.

steps.title: System Parameters
steps.description: Configure system-wide parameters such as default settings, notification preferences, and workflow rules.

steps.title: Save Changes
steps.description: Click 'Save' to apply configuration changes. Some changes may require system restart to take effect.

title: Law Management
description: Learn how to manage laws and legal requirements in the system.

steps.title: Access Law Management
steps.description: Navigate to 'Law Management' from the sidebar (admin only).

steps.title: View Laws
steps.description: Browse all laws and legal requirements configured in the system. Each law can have multiple sections.

steps.title: Add New Law
steps.description: Click 'Add Law' to create a new law entry. Provide law name, description, and effective dates.

steps.title: Manage Law Sections
steps.description: Add sections to laws, define requirements, and configure compliance criteria for each section.

steps.title: Edit or Deactivate
steps.description: Edit existing laws or deactivate laws that are no longer in effect. Deactivated laws won't appear in new inspections.

title: Database Backup and Restore
description: Learn how to backup and restore the system database.

steps.title: Access Backup Page
steps.description: Navigate to 'Database Backup' from the sidebar (admin only).

steps.title: Create Backup
steps.description: Click 'Create Backup' to generate a full database backup. The backup includes all data, settings, and configurations.

steps.title: Schedule Backups
steps.description: Configure automatic backup schedules (daily, weekly, monthly) to ensure regular data protection.

steps.title: Download Backup
steps.description: Download backup files to your local computer for additional safety. Store backups in secure locations.

steps.title: Restore from Backup
steps.description: Use 'Restore' to recover the database from a previous backup. This will replace all current data with backup data.

title: Viewing Audit Logs
description: Learn how to access and review system audit logs.

steps.title: Access Audit Logs
steps.description: Navigate to 'Audit Logs' from the sidebar (admin only).

steps.title: Filter Logs
steps.description: Use filters to search logs by user, action type, module, date range, or keywords.

steps.title: View Log Details
steps.description: Click on any log entry to view detailed information including user, action, timestamp, IP address, and metadata.

steps.title: Export Logs
steps.description: Export audit logs as CSV or Excel for external analysis or compliance reporting.

steps.title: Monitor Activity
steps.description: Use audit logs to monitor system activity, track user actions, and investigate security incidents.

title: Keyboard Shortcuts
description: Learn useful keyboard shortcuts to navigate the system faster.

steps.title: Help Center
steps.description: Press F1 or ? to open the Help Center from anywhere in the system.

steps.title: Close Modals
steps.description: Press ESC to close any open modal, dialog, or popup window.

steps.title: Search
steps.description: Press Ctrl+K or Cmd+K (Mac) to focus the search bar when available.

steps.title: Navigation
steps.description: Use Tab to navigate between form fields. Enter to submit forms. Arrow keys to navigate lists.

title: Mobile Access
description: Learn how to use the system on mobile devices and tablets.

steps.title: Mobile Browser
steps.description: Access the system through any modern mobile browser (Chrome, Safari, Firefox) on your smartphone or tablet.

steps.title: Responsive Design
steps.description: The system automatically adapts to smaller screens. Menus become collapsible and forms are optimized for touch.

steps.title: Touch Navigation
steps.description: Use touch gestures to navigate: tap to select, swipe to scroll, pinch to zoom on maps.

steps.title: Help Center on Mobile
steps.description: The Help Center becomes full-screen on mobile devices for better readability and navigation.

steps.title: Offline Capabilities
steps.description: Some features work offline. Data syncs automatically when connection is restored.

title: Reinspection Reminders
description: Learn how to manage and track reinspection reminders.

steps.title: Access Reinspection Reminders
steps.description: Navigate to 'Reinspection Reminders' from the sidebar (Division Chief access only).

steps.title: View Pending Reinspections
steps.description: See all establishments that require reinspection based on previous inspection dates and compliance status.

steps.title: Schedule Reinspections
steps.description: Schedule reinspections for establishments that are due. Set dates and assign inspectors.

steps.title: Track Status
steps.description: Monitor the status of scheduled reinspections and ensure they are completed on time.

steps.title: Generate Reminder Reports
steps.description: Export reports of pending and overdue reinspections for planning and resource allocation.
